How does your MP vote on the issues that matter to you?

Discover & Share

Discover how your representatives in parliament vote on issues you care about. You might be surprised with what you find. Easily share what you find with others.

Make it better

People like you are making the chaos of Parliament understandable by summarising divisions and explaining policies, just like Wikipedia. Fix-up mistakes or add something new—this is a shared resource built by you.

Reuse

This is a free and open source public resource. Everything here can be reused in your own project. Use our API to access the data, remix, play and tell new stories about how our laws get made.
